column4: Will Horney Horse have a built-in media center? I think that would really be a step forward for ubuntu
Are there any good media center apps for Gutsy?
Horney Horse? where did you get that from lmao
it will be called Hardy Heron see !hardy
you are offtopic and just being stupid for stupid sake now
not stupid, just a lame attempt at humour. Guess it's not allowed here :)
sexual/religious/political comments have no business in the FOSS world
but to answer your question a media Center would be nice yeah

I know there are several offerings, but one of the strong suits of ubuntu is that it chooses one main app for one purpose, and stick with that. When a mature enough media center is available, I guess it will be included in ubuntu
you can make a wish/request @ launchpad.net
I am not talking about dvds
you need libdvdcss2 to view .mov files
but mplayer seems to be able to play h.264 files just fine?
